      • takeScreenShot

        public java.lang.String takeScreenShot(java.lang.String fileName)
        Takes screenshot of current browser window. Stores 2 files: html of page, and (if possible) image in PNG format.
        Parameters:
        fileName - name of file (without extension) to store screenshot to.
        Returns:
        the name of last saved file, it's either my_screenshot.png or my_screenshot.html (if failed to create png)
